Package energy.usef.core.service.business

Package for the core business service classes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CorePlanboardBusinessService
    Global BusinessService class to help with methods used in multiple roles.
    IncomingMessageVerificationService
    Service class in charge of business validations on incoming messages (before they are sent to the incoming queue).
    MessageEncryptionService
    Business Service class in charge of the encryption/decryption/signing of the different messages.
    MessageFilterService
    Service class in charge of filtering incoming HTTP messages and, based on the denylisted addresses (IP or EA), accept or reject them.
    MessageService
    Business Service class in charge of operations concerning the Message entities.
    ParticipantDiscoveryService
    Service class in charge of the discovery of the participants on the network when a message arrives.
    ParticipantListBuilder
    This service class builds a participant lists from a YAML file.
    PlanboardHousekeepingBusinessService
    Business service class in charge of housekeeping operations concerning the common planboard.
    PrognosisConsolidationBusinessService
    Service class in charge of operations related to the Prognosis Consolidation.
    SequenceGeneratorService
    This service is in charge of the generation of unique sequence numbers that can be used in messages.
    SignedMessageHashService
    Business Service class in charge of the operations related to the SignedMessageHash entity.
    TransportHousekeepingBusinessService
    Business service class in charge of housekeeping operations concerning transport layer.

Package energy.usef.core.service.business Description

Package for the core business service classes.
